comments.author: lazydogz77

comments.text:
I don't think you can get 35's on a bronco with no lift!  33's are the 
biggest you can go on a stock 78 truck.  Get your facts straight Fred!  
More info on trucks lifts etc.  Who gives a crap about the other stuff.  
Roadkill is a much better show.  Better hosted, entertaining, less 
contrived, and tons of car info.﻿

comments.text:
Hey guys, just thought I'd let you know I really enjoyed this episode. It's 
a good bridge of interest. Most, if not all gear heads I know are into 
firearms as well. It was cool to see 2 professionals show each other a bit 
of their trade. Not a bad change of pace every one in a while. Keep up the 
good work.﻿

comments.author: Jonas Zeidler

comments.text:
I dislike it when major gun companies fund shows like this to indorse their 
products because when people who aren't educated well with firearms see 
shows like this and want to get into the world of firearms they think that 
they absolutely need the best there is and then when they see that they 
can't afford the best there is they get the idea that certain firearms are 
out of reach. 

I like shows like this that are positive about firearms, I just dislike the 
marketing scheme most of the time. 

Sorry for bitching about it, it's just I know a lot of people who feel this 
way. 

Sorry for not bothering with punctuation. ﻿
